attributes.action: Upgrade and Repair the Existing roads network - use our Road Tax on the Roads!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Am I the only one who has noticed the amount of degradation in the state of our road network? As a member of the two wheeled community also, this is getting more and more serious with every year. Bad roads kill people. Even the best drivers, no matter how skilled can be caught out by bad road design and poor road surfaces. As a motorcyclist this is even more severe  - a poor road surface is lethal to a two wheel user, there are many reports available corroborating this.
We petition the Prime Minister to stop siphoning off funds from the collection of road tax and use the FULL amount for what it is intended, fix our roads, and help keep us alive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
